overview: A Decade of Dominance is the video collection every K-Stater has been waiting for. Fourteen years in the making, this 3-disc DVD set documents K-State's rise to national prominence under Bill Snyder, and celebrates the Wildcats' 10-consecutive bowl games. Beginning with Bill Snyder's hiring in 1988, K-State football has revitalized an entire university and it's alumni base. Co-authored by K-State's Ben Boyle and Powercat Illustrated's Tim Fitzgerald, this new documnetary recaps all the great moments from Bill Snyder's first 14 seasons in Manhattan. The 3-disc set includes more than 10 hours of programming, a special introduction from Bill Snyder, selected player features, profiles on the all-Americans, the Top 10 bowl plays as selected by the coaching staff and for the first time ever -- all 10 season highlight tapes from 1993 through 2002 on DVD. Decade of Dominance is an absolute must for every K-State fan.
title: K-State | A Decade of Dominance
